Articles.Content: Whenever I hover a part over another part (in the VAB and hangar) that has an inventory, it automatically opens a pop up and puts it inside the inventory. I know it's hard to understand but I would appreciate some help.

Screenshots would really help here. Are you saying that if you picked up a part (e.g. an Ant engine) and hovered it over a part with inventory (e.g. a crew pod), it would automatically add the Ant to an inventory slot in the crew pod?

KSP version, mod list, log files please; see this guide for how to get them:
